Audioslave released their second studio album 'Out of Exile' on this day in 2005 internationally, and a day later in the US. https://t.co/jlxavnpxuu

The album charted at #1 on the @billboard 200 and four singles were released, including "Be Yourself", "Your Time Has Come", "Doesn't Remind Me", and "Out of Exile". "Doesn't Remind Me" was also nominated for Best Hard Rock Performance at the 48th Grammy Awards in 2006.
On this day in 1990, @Soundgarden released the home video style concert film 'Louder Than Live' which was filmed over 2 nights at @TheWhiskyAGoGo in Los Angeles. https://t.co/VBPuc1USZ1

It would also be great if you had anything from your experience at a show, like videos of you and your friends arriving, the marquee of the venue, etc. Can‚Äôt wait to see what you all have!

-Toni Cornell

Temple of the Dog released their debut album on this day 30 years ago. All of the lyrics on the album were written by Chris Cornell as a tribute to his friend and roommate Andrew Wood, the lead singer of Malfunkshun and Mother Love Bone, who died on March 19, 1990. https://t.co/7Naparfuio

'Live on I-5' was released on this day in 2011 by @Soundgarden. This was the band's first live album and was recorded during the West Coast leg of their 1996 tour. The title is a reference to Interstate 5, which runs along the Pacific coast of the United States. https://t.co/oU3xLMTLpr

"The Promise" was released during this week in 2017. The song was written for the film of the same name and inspired the #KeepThePromise campaign.¬†Chris believed that if we each vowed to make one promise, we could make the world a better place. https://t.co/OEBFamPHuV

Chris released his third solo album 'Scream' on this day in 2009. Produced by Timbaland and featuring contributions from Ryan Tedder, Justin Timberlake & John Mayer, the album debuted at number 10 on the Billboard 200. https://t.co/n9eh8uU1l8

"Be Yourself" was released as the first single from @Audioslave's second album 'Out of Exile' on this day in 2005. The song topped the @Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks chart for seven weeks and the Modern Rock Tracks chart for four weeks. https://t.co/3OVUGoukfW

"Like a Stone" was released as a single by @Audioslave during this week in 2003. The song was the second single released from their debut album, topping both the Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks and Modern Rock Tracks, making it their biggest US hit. https://t.co/uUmrns5iNx

"Hunger Strike" was released 30 years ago today.

On November 24th, 2014 @soundgarden released the long-awaited 3-CD rarities collection "Echo Of Miles: Scattered Tracks Across The Path". The album is a collection of rarities, live tracks, and unreleased material (‚ÄòOriginals‚Äô, ‚ÄòCovers‚Äô and, ‚ÄòOddities‚Äô) curated by Kim Thayil. https://t.co/FnHUVnHSn6

Chris‚Äôs live acoustic album ‚ÄòSongbook' was released on this day in 2011. It features songs recorded during Chris‚Äôs first-ever solo acoustic tour with setlists that spanned his entire career, including songs he wrote during his time as a member of Soundgarden, Audioslave & TOTD. https://t.co/mwIeUQy2qi
